title: News: FAMY Announce Debut Album
body:
We’ve been avid followers of FAMY for the past couple of years now, so it’s heartwarming to see the London outfit finally reach a position in which they can announce the details of their debut album.

Entitled ‘We Fam Econo’, the album is preceded by the fantastic ‘Ava’ and the most recently released ‘Ava Epilogue’. As the titles suggest, both tracks work best in succession and the videos for both provide an essential visual insight into the emotional intensity embedded in the sound of FAMY.

Released on the 8th September through Transgressive Records, ‘We Fam Econo’ is available to [pre-order now](https://www.musicglue.com/famyboys/) (check out all those snazzy options!)

FAMY UK Tour

30th July – The Lexington, London

22nd September – Sunflower Lounge, Birmingham

23rd September – The Louisiana, Bristol

24th September – The Hope, Brighton

26th September – Soup Kitchen, Manchester

27th September – Town Hall Crypt, Middlesbrough

28th September – Portland Arms, Cambridge
